013package org.apache.juneau.assertions;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
016
017import java.io.*;
018import java.nio.charset.*;
019import java.util.function.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
023
024/**
025 * Used for fluent assertion calls against byte arrays.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='topic'>Test Methods</h5>
028 * <p>
029 * <ul class='javatree'>
030 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion}
031 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
032 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isHas(Object...) isHas(Object...)}
033 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#is(Predicate) is(Predicate)}
034 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isAny(Predicate) isAny(Predicate)}
035 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isAll(Predicate) isAll(Predicate)}
036 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isEmpty() isEmpty()}
037 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isNotEmpty() isNotEmpty()}
038 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isSize(int) isSize(int)}
039 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isContains(Object) isContains(Object)}
040 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#isNotContains(Object) isNotContains(Object)}
041 *    </ul>
042 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
043 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
044 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExists() isExists()}
045 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Object) is(Object)}
046 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Predicate) is(Predicate)}
047 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNot(Object) isNot(Object)}
048 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isAny(Object...) isAny(Object...)}
049 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotAny(Object...) isNotAny(Object...)}
050 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNull() isNull()}
051 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotNull() isNotNull()}
052 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isString(String) isString(String)}
053 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isJson(String) isJson(String)}
054 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSame(Object) isSame(Object)}
055 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameJsonAs(Object) isSameJsonAs(Object)}
056 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSortedJsonAs(Object) isSameSortedJsonAs(Object)}
057 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer) isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer)}
058 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isType(Class) isType(Class)}
059 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExactType(Class) isExactType(Class)}
060 *    </ul>
061 * </ul>
062 *
063 * <h5 class='topic'>Transform Methods</h5>
064 * <p>
065 * <ul class='javatree'>
066 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentByteArrayAssertion}
067 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
068 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentByteArrayAssertion#asString() asString()}
069 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentByteArrayAssertion#asString(Charset) asString(Charset)}
070 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentByteArrayAssertion#asBase64() asBase64()}
071 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentByteArrayAssertion#asHex() asHex()}
072 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentByteArrayAssertion#asSpacedHex() asSpacedHex()}
073 *    </ul>
074 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion}
075 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
076 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#asItem(int) asItem(int)}
077 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion#asLength() asLength()}
078 *    </ul>
079 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
080 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
081 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString() asString()}
082 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(WriterSerializer) asString(WriterSerializer)}
083 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(Function) asString(Function)}
084 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJson() asJson()}
085 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJsonSorted() asJsonSorted()}
086 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asTransformed(Function) asApplied(Function)}
087 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asAny() asAny()}
088 * </ul>
089 * </ul>
090 *
091 * <h5 class='topic'>Configuration Methods</h5>
092 * <p>
093 * <ul class='javatree'>
094 *    <li class='jc'>{@link Assertion}
095 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
096 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setMsg(String, Object...) setMsg(String, Object...)}
097 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setOut(PrintStream) setOut(PrintStream)}
098 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setSilent() setSilent()}
099 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setStdOut() setStdOut()}
100 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setThrowable(Class) setThrowable(Class)}
101 *    </ul>
102 * </ul>
103 *
104 * <ul class='seealso'>
105 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-assertions.ja.Overview">Overview &gt; juneau-assertions &gt; Overview</a>
106 * </ul>
107 *
108 * @param <R> The return type.
109 */
110@FluentSetters(returns="FluentByteArrayAssertion<R>")
111public class FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> extends FluentPrimitiveArrayAssertion<Byte,byte[],R> {
112
113   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
114   // Instance
115   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
116
117   /**
118    * Constructor.
119    *
120    * @param value
121    *    The object being tested.
122    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
123    * @param returns
124    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
125    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
126    * used on the same assertion.
127    */
128   public FluentByteArrayAssertion(byte[] value, R returns) {
129      this(null, value, returns);
130   }
131
132   /**
133    * Chained constructor.
134    *
135    * <p>
136    * Used when transforming one assertion into another so that the assertion config can be used by the new assertion.
137    *
138    * @param creator
139    *    The assertion that created this assertion.
140    *    <br>Should be <jk>null</jk> if this is the top-level assertion.
141    * @param value
142    *    The object being tested.
143    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
144    * @param returns
145    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
146    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
147    * used on the same assertion.
148    */
149   public FluentByteArrayAssertion(Assertion creator, byte[] value, R returns) {
150      super(creator, value, returns);
151   }
152
153   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
154   // Transform methods
155   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
156
157   /**
158    * Converts this byte array to a UTF-8 encoded string and returns it as a new assertion.
159    *
160    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
161    * <p class='bjava'>
162    *    <jc>// Validates that the specified byte array contains the string "foobar".</jc>
163    *    <jsm>assertBytes</jsm>(<jv>myByteArray</jv>).asString().is(<js>"foobar"</js>);
164    * </p>
165    *
166    * @return A new fluent string assertion.
167    */
168   @Override
169   public FluentStringAssertion<R> asString() {
170      return asString(IOUtils.UTF8);
171   }
172
173   /**
174    * Converts this byte array to a string and returns it as a new assertion.
175    *
176    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
177    * <p class='bjava'>
178    *    <jc>// Validates that the specified byte array contains the string "foobar" encoded in ASCII.</jc>
179    *    <jsm>assertBytes</jsm>(<jv>myByteArray</jv>).asString(<js>"iso8859-1"</js>).is(<js>"foobar"</js>);
180    * </p>
181    *
182    * @param cs The charset to use to decode the string.
183    * @return A new fluent string assertion.
184    */
185   public FluentStringAssertion<R> asString(Charset cs) {
186      return new FluentStringAssertion<>(this, valueIsNull() ? null : new String(value(), cs), returns());
187   }
188
189   /**
190    * Converts this byte array to a base-64 encoded string and returns it as a new assertion.
191    *
192    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
193    * <p class='bjava'>
194    *    <jc>// Validates that the specified byte array contains the string "foo".</jc>
195    *    <jsm>assertBytes</jsm>(<jv>myByteArray</jv>).asBase64().is(<js>"Zm9v"</js>);
196    * </p>
197    *
198    * @return A new fluent string assertion.
199    */
200   public FluentStringAssertion<R> asBase64() {
201      return new FluentStringAssertion<>(this, valueIsNull() ? null : base64Encode(value()), returns());
202   }
203
204   /**
205    * Converts this byte array to hexadecimal and returns it as a new assertion.
206    *
207    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
208    * <p class='bjava'>
209    *    <jc>// Validates that the specified byte array contains the string "foo".</jc>
210    *    <jsm>assertBytes</jsm>(<jv>myByteArray</jv>).asHex().is(<js>"666F6F"</js>);
211    * </p>
212    *
213    * @return A new string consisting of hexadecimal characters.
214    */
215   public FluentStringAssertion<R> asHex() {
216      return new FluentStringAssertion<>(this, valueIsNull() ? null : toHex(value()), returns());
217   }
218
219   /**
220    * Converts this byte array to spaced hexadecimal and returns it as a new assertion.
221    *
222    * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
223    * <p class='bjava'>
224    *    <jc>// Validates that the specified byte array contains the string "foo".</jc>
225    *    <jsm>assertBytes</jsm>(<jv>myByteArray</jv>).asSpacedHex().is(<js>"66 6F 6F"</js>);
226    * </p>
227    *
228    * @return A new string consisting of hexadecimal characters.
229    */
230   public FluentStringAssertion<R> asSpacedHex() {
231      return new FluentStringAssertion<>(this, valueIsNull() ? null : toSpacedHex(value()), returns());
232   }
233
234   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
235   // Fluent setters
236   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
237
238   // <FluentSetters>
239
240   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
241   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> setMsg(String msg, Object...args) {
242      super.setMsg(msg, args);
243      return this;
244   }
245
246   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
247   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> setOut(PrintStream value) {
248      super.setOut(value);
249      return this;
250   }
251
252   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
253   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> setSilent() {
254      super.setSilent();
255      return this;
256   }
257
258   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
259   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> setStdOut() {
260      super.setStdOut();
261      return this;
262   }
263
264   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
265   public FluentByteArrayAssertion<R> setThrowable(Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> value) {
266      super.setThrowable(value);
267      return this;
268   }
269
270   // </FluentSetters>
271}
